Class Utils

java.lang.Object
tage.Utils
public class Utils extends Object
Shader and graphics utilities used by the engine. This class is taken from Computer Graphics Programming in OpenGL with Java.

Most of the functions are used by the engine and are protected (and thus not visible in the javadoc).

The predefined materials are shown here and may be used by the game application.

Author:
Scott Gordon, John Clevenger
